Articles.Content:
My boyfriend suggested that I try this game out, so here I am.

I built my first rocket but it didn't lift off of the ground. He just snickered. XD But helped me with it. What are some fun things that I can do in this game?

Welcome to the forums!

The easy answer would be "Whatever you can think of." If you want some inspiration for anything more specific, feel free to check out some of the mission reports, screenshot and craft showcase threads, or even just ask a few questions around here.

Hello! Glad to see another female Kerbonaut here. Welcome to the forums!

You just do whatever you want, be it crashing into the sun or going out of the galaxy. The possibilities are endless!
Get Kerbal engineer it will tell you your thrust to weight ratio (whether you will fly or not) and all kinds of other good stuff.
